name: The Walls Have Bullets
description:
A desktop version is also available for download. The game runs better on desktop.

The Walls Have Bullets is a frantic shoot-em-up where you can't stop firing. Hitting the walls can cause the walls to shoot back at you punishing you for being so trigger happy. This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2020. The theme was "out of control."

How to play:
  • Dodge bullets with W, A, S ,and D
  • Aim at enemies with the mouse
  • Don't forget to pickup ammo refills!
Attributions: Sound:
  • Sounds effects by NenadSimic, Lamoot, Michel Baradari, and Joth all from opengameart.org under CC0 or CC-BY 3.0. Some sounds may be slightly modified in pitch/duration.
  • Additional sound effects by DWOBoyle, nsstudios, and Dpoggioli at freesound.org under CC-BY 3.0.
  • Music titled "Cybermatic Pulse" by Alexandr Zhelanov also from opengameart.org under CC-BY 4.0
Art
  • Floor textures  by jestan at opengameart.org under CC-BY-3.0. Texture colors were slightly modified.
  • Wall textures by tebruno99 at opengameart.org under CC0.
  • Tank sprites by Zintoki from here at itch.io. Colors were altered.
  • Pickup sprites by Fleurman at opengameart.org under CC0.
  • Bullet sprites by Rawdanitsu at opengameart.org under CC0.
  • Crosshair by para at opengameart.org under CC0.
  • Explosions by Sinestesia at opengameart.org under CC0.
  • Background by Westbeam at opengameart.org under CC0.
